definitions.definition: In a condition of bankruptcy ; unable to pay outstanding debts or meet financial obligations ; specifically, having been legally declared insolvent .
definitions.label_groups: finance , of a person , company , etc.

definitions.definition: Destitute of, or wholly lacking a good quality , value , etc. one should possess or once possessed.

main_definition: ( finance , of a person , company , etc. ) In a condition of bankruptcy ; unable to pay outstanding debts or meet financial obligations ; specifically, having been legally declared insolvent . [from 1565]
secondary_definitions: ( figurative ) Destitute of, or wholly lacking a good quality , value , etc. one should possess or once possessed. [from 1567]
